title: Eco-Conscious Apartment With Mountain Views in Tranquil Dyrekcja
description: Newly renovated with modern touches, this sunny 3-bedroom apartment offers a perfect blend of comfort, style, and sustainability. With one sleek bathroom and a contemporary kitchen, every corner is thoughtfully designed to meet daily needs. The spacious 87 sqm layout invites tranquility, complemented by smart lighting, eco-friendly appliances, and ample natural light.
neighborhood_description: Dyrekcja is a quiet, verdant neighborhood in Chelm characterized by low urban density, perfect for those seeking respite from city crowds. Enjoy shopping and dining options just minutes away as well as proximity to the business district—all with the stunning backdrop of nearby mountains. Efficient highway access provides seamless travel for commuters and road trip lovers alike.
lifestyle_benefits: easy access to highway for commuters and travelers
flexible parking for families with electric vehicles
low urban noise level ensures tranquility
nearby shopping and dining for daily convenience
target_buyer: Ideal for long-term renters or buyers seeking long-lasting stability and an active, green-conscious lifestyle close to city amenities, yet away from urban hustle.
market_positioning: This property stands out in Dyrekcja’s market as an energy-efficient, newly renovated apartment for those valuing private eco-friendly transportation, panoramic surroundings, and convenient access to shopping and business, rarely matched at this price point.
